short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get quality surfing images in your new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing experience with surfing photos and quick access to  surfing sites, all from your new tab page. Dive into the waves with Shaka!

By clicking "Add to Chrome" I accept and agree to install the Shaka New Tab Chrome extension and hereby agree to set the Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy policy and Terms of Use. The search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Privacy Policy - https://shakatab.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use - https://shakatab.com/terms.html
